SEARCH
Package EstablishmentPack

Class Restaurant

java.lang.Object
EstablishmentPack.Restaurant
All Implemented Interfaces:
Establishment, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AmericanRestaurant, AsianRestaurant, EuropeanRestaurant
public class Restaurant extends Object implements Establishment, Serializable
Class representing the restaurant. This class will be inherited by other classes AmericanRestaurant EuropeanRestaurant AsianRestaurant also implements the interface Establishment and serialization Serializable

    • setBar

      public void setBar(String drink1, String drink2, String drink3)
      Method to set up the bar with drinks for the restaurant. Creates an object Bar that is an aggregation for this class
      Parameters:
      drink1 - The first drink offered at the bar.
      drink2 - The second drink offered at the bar.
      drink3 - The third drink offered at the bar.

    • getBar
